column2: "Yes, I got in. Now, let's see if there's anything strange-... Wha-!"
"Hey, What the... Eh?! T-this is... My clothes? I'm barefoot, even!"
"Wait, where's my Avatar self?! The one I created when I started \"PSO2\", that Aru lookalike avatar..."
"...Don't tell me, Aru took that form with him?"
"Does that mean I have to stay in this form? My heart's not prepared for this!"
"Is that a new Avatar? You look exactly like you in real life. I didn't know those clothes existed here."
"Aah, umm, well... How do I explain this..."
"Uwaah?! A c-call? Wai-I remember, you're Xiera right?"
"Yup, Xiera here. It's good to see you doing well, Hitsugi."
"Would it be okay for you to spare some time to come and talk with us? <%me>'s here as well."
"...Alright. I've got a few questions of my own too."
"Sorry Kohri. Something came up. I'll see you later."
